page.title: 05 Village Organisations(1)
page.content: Women's Institute The people there are women who get together to learn things.Also they help other people to do things which they cannot do. The W.I. has continued in its task of providing classes, entertainment and support for various charities over the years.The W.I. still feels it has a major part to play in the life of the community. ----------------- Royal British Legion They look after people who were served in the forces,and over the years they have raised money to help both loca ex-service personnel and their dependants,and to contribute to the National Poppy Appeal.
